text: ________ is a collection of logically related data and metadata
_____________ is a software package that is used for managing a database and for controlling access to the data
_____________ is the state when the data does not violate constraints (For example, the month should be between 1 and 12)
_____________ is the ability to provide data to many users and applications
_____________ is a form of query language that is designed to retrieve, manipulate and make ad-hoc analysis of data
_____________ is a language for defining or declaring of database objects together with integrity and security constraints
_____________ is a language for supporting basic data manipulations, such as data retrieving, adding, deleting and modifying
_____________ is a language used to control who or what has access to specific objects in the database
_____________ is a language used to control database transactions
_____________ is a discipline that focuses on the generation, storage and retrieval of data
_____________ is a collection of related records
_____________ is a logically connected set of one or more data fields that describe an entity
_____________ is the result of processing, organizing or summarizing raw data to reveal its meaning
_____________ are raw and isolated facts that have not been processed to reveal their meaning
_____________ is a logical unit of work
To make all changes from a transaction permanent, an operation called _______ must be executed
To leave the database in its original state when using transactions, operation called _________ must be executed
_______ database is a database which only one user can access at a time
_______ database is a database which multiple/many users can access at a time
_______ database is a database that is located at a single site
_______ database is a database where data is distributed across several different sites
_______ database is a database which is used for supporting day-to-day operations
_______ is a database containing historical data collected from transactional systems, transformed, cleaned and ready for analysis

<image style='width:500px;' src='https://external-content.duckduckgo.com/iu/?u=https%3A%2F%2Fi.pinimg.com%2Foriginals%2F2c%2Fe5%2F43%2F2ce5436f463edfbb9b37df2bd45b32e5.jpg&f=1&nofb=1&ipt=8e7c8231ec08437be5a7105d10f14ec2881700c3dd092a46df0a3fa9fda913e6'>
______ is a field or combination of fields that uniquely and minimally identifies a particular entity
______ is a restriction placed on data, usually in the form of rules
______ is the association or the way different entities relate to each other
______ is a descriptive property or characteristic of an entity
______ is an object that can be distinguished from others and about which information is stored
______ exists when the same data are unnecessarily stored in different places
The oposite of ______ exists when different versions of the same data appear in different places
_______ is the ability to be expanded, modified or downsized easily according to the current business needs
